title: crytopressing
author: crytopressing
content: While we witnessed the rise of decentralized exchange technology and infrastructure, we also saw something else.Mainly focusing on the Binance Smart Chain, thanks to the very low transaction fees and ease of programming, this group saw the many scams and abuse perpetrated every day.Anonymous BSC is your trusted source for Binance Smart Chain projects and review. The goal is to identify those that are known to scam others while also creating a safe place to find new projects to be involved with. Join us on our mission as we continue to develop our project’s utility and database to provide you security in an unregulated environment.Website: https://anonymouscoin.io/Telegram: https://t.me/anonymouscoinofficial

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: I think your project is mainly about BSC blockchain as your project is based on it and you can not post things that are not related to BTC here on this thread (or maybe I am wrong). But you did try to link yourself to BTC by declaring yourself a Pepe community which indirectly means you are a community using Pepe token which is based on the BTC blockchain.And TBH, I from one of those who do not like the idea of Ordinals because it has hurt the adoption of BTC. (I don't want to talk about reasons here so I will just give up). and I do visit your website and the theme is good enough to give any of the users the to create a thought ok I am in an anonymous group website. You in this post more focused to solve the problems by catching the ones who are scammers and yet your portfolio contains zero cases and on the website you are more focused on making users buy your token. Best of luck.

comments.author: coin-investor

The goal is to identify those that are known to scam others while also creating a safe place to find new projects to be involved with. Join us on our mission as we continue to develop our project’s utility and database to provide you security in an unregulated environment.This section is project development based on the look of your website it is already complete, you should post this in the altcoin announcement its where shitcoins belong, this is another pump-and-dump project, you already admitted it on your homepage.QuoteWatch Your Anonymous get pumped , there's nothing on your project that will bring true usability and benefit to the community.
